Hello Heroes! Guilds are here in our latest update - create and join Guilds with your friends to compete for massive rewards! Plus we've added:
• Daily login bonuses that improve all month long  - check the Newsfeed every day
• An all-new streamlined and improved tutorial, with reduced duration and increased rewards
We've also made some behind-the-scenes improvements to make overall gameplay even better. Thanks as always for playing, and please rate us after each update. Battle on!

Heroes of Thedas, Guilds have been improved in our latest update with these great new features:

· Guild chat! Speak with your Guild-mates in-game.
· New Guild event screen shows leaderboards and rewards, and prizes are now disbursed in-game.
· During Guild events, your Guild’s rank is now displayed on the battle screen!

Plus, we’ve doubled total Squad Slots – unlock slots 5-8 by gaining player levels – and made some behind-the-scenes enhancements. Battle on!

Calling all Heroes! With our latest update, we’ve added many new features and improvements, including:
·         The ability to craft runes into higher rarities
·         Weekly rewards in global PvP, now renamed Proving Grounds
·         A faster and more elegant gallery
·         Revamped announcements for a better look at weekly updates
·         A slew of improvements to guild chat, the onslaught screen, consuming, optimizations, runes, and more
Thanks for playing. Battle on!

Heroes of Thedas! We are proud to introduce two new features to Heroes of Dragon Age:
• Heroes may now be bolstered with awesome Gear, including armor, weapons, and accessories, that boost strength and defensibility
•  The amazing Tome of Ascension elevates Heroes beyond Legendary to Mythic Rarity, increasing maximum level and unlocking additional Gear slots
We’ve also made some behind-the-scenes changes to overall gameplay. Thanks for playing and battle on!

Greetings, Heroes of Thedas! As part of our latest update, now you can:
• Remove Heroes currently used for fortification and ascend them to Mythic Rarity, move them to another Hero, or simply reclaim them for use
•  Wisp Ascension – Tier your Legendary Wisps to Mythic with no extra gear unlock requirements
•  Prepare your squads for “The Gauntlet” – a new survival quest mode.
•  Access an additional PVP event modifier
•  Discover a secondary Defense Team added for Proving Grounds
Thanks for playing!

Greetings, Heroes! As part of our latest update, now you can:
• Consume dozens of heroes at once based on rarity, faction, or identical heroes
•  Get at-a-glance information on your Pack Guarantees with In-Game Pack Counters
•  Pick up new pack type, The Vault, with three tiers offering generous bonus Gem rewards that can be claimed each day
•  Discover the newest Heroes and special offerings quickly and easily with our improved store layout
Thanks for playing!

Greetings, Heroes! Our latest version includes updates, like::
·        Battles engaged through the Ally List no longer affect Proving Ground Leaderboard standings
·         Squad-based Runes have been implemented
·        Any purchase made with Gems will now be preceded by a pop-up confirmation message
·         Improved sorting of Heroes with updates made to the Hero Roster
Read the in-game patch notes for additional information on the latest version. Thanks for playing!

Greetings, Heroes! Check out our latest update, including:
• Pack odds information – tap the new store icon to see detailed information on pack odds
•  Increased iPhone X compatibility with enhanced UI to resolve portions of the in-game screen covered by the iPhone X screen notch
•  Miscellaneous updates, like resolved translation problems as well as behind-the-scenes improvements for performance and stability
•  Thanks for playing!

Here’s what’s new with our latest update:
Prestige Runes – Equip the new Prestige Rune slot in your squad window for additional power-ups and benefits!
Prestige Gear Slot – Unlock a new gear slot to equip an extra Legendary or Mythic gear.
Player Stat Cards – Displays level, experience, and account information in one convenient location.
PVP Event Updates – Rebalanced ladder and rank rewards.
Level Cap removed – An updated progression system will not restrict players to a maximum level.

Hey, players! We’ve made changes to improve your game, like:
Significant game engine updates for increased stability, performance improvements, and fixes to several issues
An altered Gauntlet and PVE Event reward display, based on feedback – Hero or Gear rewards are followed by gold and experience
New Hero Roster filters, including the ‘Mythic’ and ‘Assigned’ filter – sort heroes by rarities and display heroes currently assigned to any squad in the active roster
